verses.verse: "I am the <S%H2261>rose<s%> of <S%H8289>Sharon,<s%> The <S%H7799>lily<s%> of the <S%H6010>valleys.<s%>"

"Like an <S%H8598>apple<s%> <S%H8598>tree<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> is my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1121>men.<s%> In his <S%H6738>shade<s%> I <S%H2530>took<s%> great <S%H2530>delight<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down,<s%> And his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> was <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to my <S%H2441>taste.<s%>
"He has <S%H935>brought<s%> me to [his] <S%H3196>banquet<s%> <S%H1004>hall,<s%> And his <S%H1714>banner<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me is <S%H160>love.<s%>
<S%H5564>"Sustain<s%> me with <S%H809>raisin<s%> <S%H809>cakes,<s%> <S%H7502>Refresh<s%> me with <S%H8598>apples,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I am <S%H2470>lovesick.<s%> <S%H160><s%>
"[Let] his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> be <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> And his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H2263>embrace<s%> me."

"I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> you, O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> By the <S%H6643>gazelles<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> by the <S%H355>hinds<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> That you will not <S%H5782>arouse<s%> or <S%H5782>awaken<s%> [my] <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> she <S%H2654>pleases.<s%>"
<S%H6963>"Listen!<s%> My <S%H1730>beloved!<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> he is <S%H935>coming,<s%> <S%H1801>Climbing<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H7092>Leaping<s%> on the <S%H1389>hills!<s%>

"My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>stag.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> he is <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> our <S%H3796>wall,<s%> He is <S%H7688>looking<s%> <S%H4480>through<s%> the <S%H2474>windows,<s%> He is <S%H9473>peering<s%> <S%H4480>through<s%> the <S%H2762>lattice.<s%>
"My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H6030>responded<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6965>'Arise,<s%> my <S%H7474>darling,<s%> my <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H3303>one,<s%> And <S%H1980>come<s%> along.

'The <S%H5339>flowers<s%> have [already] <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> The <S%H6256>time<s%> has <S%H5060>arrived<s%> for <S%H2159>pruning<s%> [the vines,] And the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H8449>turtledove<s%> has been <S%H8085>heard<s%> in our <S%H776>land.<s%>

'The <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree<s%> has <S%H2590>ripened<s%> its <S%H6291>figs,<s%> And the <S%H1612>vines<s%> in <S%H5563>blossom<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> forth [their] <S%H7381>fragrance.<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> my <S%H7474>darling,<s%> my <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H3303>one,<s%> And <S%H1980>come<s%> along!' "

"O my <S%H3123>dove,<s%> in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> In the <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H5643>place<s%> of the <S%H4095>steep<s%> <S%H4095>pathway,<s%> Let me <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H4758>form,<s%> Let me <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H6963>voice;<s%> For your <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H6156>sweet,<s%> And your <S%H4758>form<s%> is <S%H5000>lovely.<s%>"

<S%H270>"Catch<s%> the <S%H7776>foxes<s%> for us, The <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H7776>foxes<s%> that are <S%H2254>ruining<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> While our <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> are in <S%H5563>blossom.<s%>"
"My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is mine, and I am his; He <S%H7462>pastures<s%> [his flock] among the <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>

<S%H5704>"Until<s%> the <S%H6315>cool<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H6738>shadows<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> away, <S%H5437>Turn,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> and be <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> <S%H176>Or<s%> a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>stag<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1336>Bether.<s%>"
